tweets.text:
Close it, cap it, clean it. 
We will settle for nothing less. And this needs to start NOW - not being stalled for another year. Give me a biohazard suit & I‚Äôll bring a spade myself @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice @MattHancock @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency https://t.co/OzNy3CXg8f

@SianieRoo @HelenVi00175623 @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @DefraGovUK I've just vomited in the kitchen. I've had an increase in headaches, migraines, and sleep deprivation, but I've never vomited because of the odour before üòî What a way to start the work day üëç Positive news can't come soon enough.

Breaking News . @EnvAgency have sanctioned the destruction of breeding birds tomorrow at the Lower Otter Restoration Project . This is #HS2 part 2 . PLEASE THINK AGAIN @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest Please follow @WiseBirding and RT https://t.co/I8Wv40YKqy

It's worth pointing out @EnvAgency mission statement says  "It's our job to look after your environment and create better places for people and wildlife."  Clearly, that's rubbish! https://t.co/x3lwcWupJ8

tweets.text: @SimonTagg @JamesBevanEA @MattHancock @EnvAgencyMids @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA This place needs closing and capping, if it needs to become an orphan site so be it, If you had done your job correctly in the first place then there would be more than ¬£1 million set aside for the restoration phase. That's not our fault, it's yours.

Year 6 have had a brilliant workshop from @EnvAgency @BostonBarrierEA to aid our learning. Exploring the floods the local area faced and how to prevent them has been a great way to start our D.T this term - civil engineers here we come! #EducatingChampions @WybertonPrimary https://t.co/EgNv8Duj3V

tweets.text:
Thank you @MattHancock for supporting my campaign, and the people of #NewcastleUnderLyme, by writing to the @EnvAgency.

As Matt says, it is imperative that the Environment Agency exercise the full range of their regulatory and enforcement powers over the company. https://t.co/lH1na7Cr8A

@EnvAgency Air quality reports released today showing @RedIndustries2 Walley‚Äôs Quarry Landfill consistently & massively breaching WHO health and nuisance guideline levelsüëáSign the petition to ensure this does not happen ever again in the UK #stopthestink https://t.co/Lgsdqydotl https://t.co/bLpwh9eYa2

It is. It is astonishing. But it is and @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @MPGeorgeEustice know it. So does @StaffordshireCC @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids Thank You @DJAndyMoor for your support and voice @StinkStopthe https://t.co/cikerfAUTU

tweets.text: The site is littered with tyres going odd google earth and drone footage. @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids I thought this was illegal? #stopthestink #capitoff. https://t.co/SklFpdYD2f

Deadline passed to comply with @EnvAgency , @RedIndustries2 don‚Äôt know where the gas is coming from or what went wrong.. so what do they do? Start dumping more hazardous waste in the exact same way..  Where is the @EnvAgencyMids... silence.. @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/nMGtdHO60j

Look what you did @johnprescott @UKLabour can someone help because @EnvAgency has overlooked complaints for years and has allowed it to escalate to a #healthcrisis with no clean air in sight. Children are being gassed in their home and in their schools.  People are desperate.. https://t.co/W4vpCZcL6d

@sunnyraisin62 @scottdegg @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @RedIndustries2 @PHE_uk @StinkStopthe There was drone footage last weekend of the site removing large amounts of plasterboard from the landfill that had recently been tipped ahead of the @EnvAgency visit so this one is a certainty. The inspection process should never allow this to happen...  @DefraGovUK @WHO
